questions.question: What is population?

options.text: Number of people living in an area

questions.answer: Number of people living in an area

questions.question: Population density means ____.
questions.answer: Population per unit area

questions.question: Which factor mainly affects population distribution?
questions.answer: All of these

questions.question: Which continent has the highest population?
questions.answer: Asia

questions.question: Which country has the highest population in the world?
questions.answer: China

questions.question: What is birth rate?

options.text: Number of births per thousand people

questions.answer: Number of births per thousand people

questions.question: What is death rate?
questions.answer: Deaths per thousand people

questions.question: Which factor increases population growth?
questions.answer: High birth rate

questions.question: What is migration?

options.text: Movement of people from one place to another

questions.answer: Movement of people from one place to another

questions.question: Which type of migration is movement within a country?
questions.answer: Internal migration

questions.question: What is population?
questions.answer: Population is the total number of people living in a particular area at a given time.

questions.question: Define population density.
questions.answer: Population density is the number of people living per unit area.

questions.question: Which factors affect population distribution?
questions.answer: Climate, relief, soil, water availability and economic activities affect population distribution.

questions.question: What is migration?
questions.answer: Migration is the movement of people from one place to another.

questions.question: What is natural growth of population?
questions.answer: Natural growth is the difference between birth rate and death rate.
